title: Blogz
description: Blogz is a dynamic MERN stack social network application. Node and Express manage routes for user actions like post creation, likes, and deletion. Test Blogz with username & password as 'demo'.

title: ReactNews
description: React News is a Next.js TypeScript app powered by the GNews API featuring a curation of the latest news articles on a variety of subjects sourced from over 50,000 news vendors around the world.

title: Explore Movies
description: This React & Express web application was written in JavaScript and utilises MaterialUI with custom styled components, featuring movies sourced via the TMDb API with save to favourites functionality.

title: Expenses Chart Component
description: This Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind app involves dynamically presenting JSON chart data using Chart.js. Bars are represented by the amount of spending, and the current day as per the user's locale is highlighted with a different colour bar.

title: News Homepage
description: This Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind app includes a stunning and well laid out news homepage split into appropriate functional components.

title: Results Summary Component
description: A Results Summary Component for a psychometric test built with Vanilla JavaScript and SCSS with no external libraries or frameworks.
